item.description:
Britt will be having a birthday party at Tokyo on Saturday, Dec 16. Note that the event begins at the unusually early time of 5:00pm EST, which should not be too much of a problem on a Saturday. The hostess of the party is Kerri, and she is keeping a separate count of attendees via MySpace since many people will be attending who are friends of Britt but not necessarily even of sushi; please RSVP both via MeetUp.com and, if you have an account there, via MySpace as well:

MySpace party invitation

group.name: The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Sushi birthday party for Britt at Tokyo
